title: Constructive conversations
desc:
This workshop will show you how to address performance issues with team members and follow through on HR procedures. You’ll learn how to hold an effective performance improvement meeting and still keep the relationship positive.

The workshop demonstrates how to get people back on track quickly, avoid an escalation of the problem and minimise the need for formal procedures.

outcomes.blurb: By the end of this workshop, you’ll find out how to:
points: use questioning and listening techniques to establish any causes of the performance issue
provide constructive feedback, using examples to help the individual see the impact of their behaviour
manage your emotions so you can deal with the problem objectively
set up an action plan and record the results of the discussion on it
